```{r rebasing}
deflator<-read.csv(here("Data","GDP","USAGDPDEFAISMEI.csv"))
#GDP deflator found here https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/usagdpdefaismei
deflator<- rename(deflator,value=USAGDPDEFAISMEI)
deflator<- subset(deflator,value < 103 & value > 91) %>%
  select(value)
deflator<- as.matrix(deflator)
deflator<- deflator * 0.01
deflator<- rep(deflator,times=45)
deflator<- as.matrix(deflator)
data$caid<-diag(data$caid_usdcurrent) %*% deflator
data$usaid<-diag(data$usaid_usdcurrent) %*% deflator
data<- data %>%
  select(-caid_usdconstant2017,-caid_usdcurrent,-usaid_usdconstant2020,-usaid_usdcurrent) %>%
  rename(gdp=gdp_usdconstant2015)
data["caid"][is.na(data["caid"])] <- 0
data<-data %>%
  mutate(log_usaid=log(usaid)) %>%
  mutate(log_caid=log(caid)) %>%
  mutate(log_gdp=log(gdp))
data["log_caid"][data["log_caid"] == -Inf] <- 0
data["log_usaid"][is.na(data["log_usaid"])] <- 0
```

```{r analysis}
#Internet Freedom item? "Government social media censorship in practice (C) (v2smgovsmcenprc)"
#Proxy for Big Tech company presence as opposed to restrictive Chinese media? " Online media perspectives (C) (v2smonper)"
#Political variable? v2x_polyarchy
#
#Casey's recommended steps: 
#1) Determine N and T
data_panel<-pdata.frame(data, index=c("country", "year"))
pdim(data_panel)
#
#2) Estimate pooled, RE, CRE models
#pooled:
model_pooled<-plm(log_usaid~dsp+log_caid+log_gdp+internet+polity2,data=data_panel)
pbgtest(model_pooled)
c_pooled<-vcovHC(model_pooled,cluster = "group")
signif(coeftest(model_pooled, vcov=c_pooled))
#RE:
model_re<-plm(log_usaid~v2smgovsmcenprc+log_caid+log_gdp+internet+v2x_polyarchy+factor(country)+factor(year),data=data_panel,model="random",random.method = "walhus")
c_re<-vcovHC(model_re,cluster="group")
coeftest(model_re,vcov. = c_re)
pbgtest(model_re)
#3) nested model test
#4) if reject, use (LSDV,within)/FD
#5) if can't reject, use vanilla, pooled model with clustered std errors
#
#FE LSDV
model_fe<-plm(log_usaid~v2smgovsmcenprc+log_caid+log_gdp+internet+v2x_polyarchy,data = data_panel,effect = "individual",model = "within")
summary(model_fe)
#RE2
model_re2<-plm(log_usaid~v2smgovsmcenprc+log_caid+log_gdp+internet+v2x_polyarchy,data = data_panel,effect = "individual",model = "random")
c_re2<-vcovHC(model_re2,cluster = "group")
coeftest(model_re2,vcov. = c_re2)
wtf<-lm(log_usaid~log_caid+v2smgovsmcenprc+log_gdp+internet+v2x_polyarchy,data=data)
summary(wtf)
cor(data$v2smgovsmcenprc,data$v2x_polyarchy)
```
